BSGR.AS.summary: B&S Group S.A. distributes consumer goods worldwide. The company operates through HTG Liquors, HTG Health & Beauty, B&S, and Retail segments. The HTG Liquors segment distributes branded liquors to retailers, local distributors, and wholesalers. The HTG Health & Beauty segment distributes and sells branded perfumes, cosmetics, and personal care products to value, online, and secondary retailers; directly to consumers through web shops; and local distributors and wholesalers. The B&S segment distributes food and beverage products, as well as liquor and health and beauty products to maritime, remote and retail, and B2B markets. The Retail segment primarily operates an electronic consumer lifestyle format under the Royal Capi-Lux brand at international airports; and a consumer goods format under the B&S brand at regional airports and other away from home locations. The company was incorporated in 2007 and is based in Betzdorf, Luxembourg.
